description:
Android App Inventor is a free drag and drop Android app building software that allows anyone to build inventive and unique Android apps without any knowledge of computer programming. In this online course youâ€™ll learn how to make an app in less than 2 hours, course will explain the programming concepts for non coders as well. how to make and publish App Inventor apps to Google Play.

The course is focused mainly on developing your programming concepts. These concepts will help you in your professional as well as personal life.

This course can be taken by anyone, but basically its best for Beginners and Intermediate levels.
title: Mobile Apps Development through App Inventor
